textContent: When I was studying for Eiken grade 1, I realized that studying for exams is very important. This is because I want to prove my language ability. However, to prove it, the exam has to be designed in a certain form. That is why, we also adjust ourselves to it.
title: Why I am taking the language exam.
textContentHtml: When I was studying for Eiken grade 1, I realized that studying for exams is very important. This is because I want to prove my language ability. However, to prove it, the exam has to be designed in a certain form. That is why, we also adjust ourselves to it.
